description: Defines the main view component for a ToDo list application using the Enyo framework, including UI elements, event handlers, and data bindings.

classes.name: ToDo.NotepadMainView
classes.description: Main view component for the ToDo list, managing task display, user interactions, and data bindings.

methods.name: markAllComplete
methods.description: Handles the event to mark all tasks as complete by bubbling 'onMarkAllComplete'.

methods.name: sendEnter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key press in input fields to trigger blur event.

methods.name: sendEsc
methods.description: Handles the Escape key press in input fields to trigger 'onSendEsc' event.

methods.name: rendered
methods.description: Called when the component is rendered; triggers a reload event.
